statements: SELECT * FROM risk_management_parameters;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM risk_management_parameters;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM risk_management_parameters WHERE parameter_value > 0.5;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM risk_management_parameters ORDER BY parameter_value DESC;
SELECT parameter_name, MAX(parameter_value) AS max_value FROM risk_management_parameters GROUP BY parameter_name;
SELECT parameter_id, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM risk_management_parameters WHERE parameter_value > 100 ORDER BY parameter_value DESC;
SELECT parameter_id, parameter_name, parameter_description FROM risk_management_parameters WHERE parameter_name LIKE 'Credit%' ORDER BY parameter_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM risk_management_parameters WHERE parameter_id IN (1, 3, 5) OR parameter_description IS NULL;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM risk_management_parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'Market Risk' AND (parameter_value >= 50 OR parameter_value <= 30);

SELECT parameter_id, parameter_name, parameter_value, parameter_description FROM risk_management_parameters WHERE parameter_name LIKE '%Risk%' AND parameter_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY parameter_id;
SELECT * FROM RiskManagementParameters;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM RiskManagementParameters WHERE parameter_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM PortfolioBalances WHERE asset_name = 'Stocks';
SELECT portfolio_id, balance FROM PortfolioBalances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM RiskManagementParameters WHERE parameter_name LIKE '%loss%';
SELECT parameter_id, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM RiskManagementParameters ORDER BY parameter_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM RiskManagementParameters WHERE parameter_name LIKE '%risk%' OR parameter_name LIKE '%strategy%';
SELECT parameter_name, SUM(parameter_value) AS total_value FROM RiskManagementParameters GROUP BY parameter_name;
SELECT asset_name, balance FROM PortfolioBalances WHERE balance > 10000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM PortfolioBalances WHERE account_id = '12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef';

SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM RiskManagementParameters ORDER BY parameter_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM PortfolioBalances WHERE currency='USD';
SELECT id, trade_date, trade_amount FROM ArbitrageTrades ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT id, description FROM RiskManagementParameters WHERE id=2;
SELECT * FROM RiskManagementParameters WHERE id = 1;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM RiskManagementParameters WHERE parameter_value > 100.0;
SELECT id, parameter_name, description FROM RiskManagementParameters WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM PortfolioBalances WHERE balance_amount < 0;
SELECT portfolio_id, balance_amount, currency FROM PortfolioBalances WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT * FROM RiskParams;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM RiskParams ORDER BY parameter_name DESC;
SELECT portfolio_id, balance FROM PortfolioBalances WHERE balance > 10000;
SELECT * FROM ArbitrageTrading WHERE trade_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM TrackedAssets ORDER BY asset_id ASC;

SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM RiskParams WHERE parameter_value > 1000
SELECT portfolio_id, balance FROM PortfolioBalances WHERE balance >= 5000 ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT strategy_name, trade_amount FROM ArbitrageTrading WHERE trade_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_value FROM TrackedAssets ORDER BY last_updated DESC
